msbt.message: I got your card! I was surprised you attached a present! I can't believe it fit through the mail!
I had fun reading your card! It was full of words. And a present! I'm gonna send you a present too! It's part of this message, in case you were wondering.
Thanks for the card! And your present! Sorry I'm writing slow right now. I am eating snacks. I hope it reads faster than I wrote it. Oh! Here's a present for you too!
I loved the card you sent me! I've been reading it every day! I'm going to keep reading it until I can recite it from memory!
Thanks for the card! I read it all the way to the end! I would love it if you sent another! I'll be waiting!
I was so surprised by your card! I loved it! I read it while eating some snacks. Send another if ya wanna!
